channel.title: Source code on
channel.description: Recent content in Source code on

item.title: Where to find
item.description: All plug-ins included in the SPARTA suite employ the open-source JUCE framework for their graphical user-interface (GUI) and for wrapping arround the VST2 SDK. The open-source Spatial_Audio_Framework is then used for developing the internal spatial audio signal processing. Source code for the Spatial_Audio_Framework → Documentation for the Spatial_Audio_Framework → Source code for the JUCE framework → Download link for the VST2 SDK → SPARTA suite source code The source code for the SPARTA plug-ins is made available under the GNU GPLv3 license.
